meanings: (소리가) (사람이 주어) hear, (소리가 주어) be heard, be audible
Verb have someone lifted, have something lifted
Verb tell something, have something heard

meanings.meaning: take the sound to be imaginary

vlive.korean: 들린다. I hear them. 듣기 View video STARSHIP : [BEHIND] 정세운, 첫 콘서트 무대를 서다!
들린다! - 들리나요? It's working. - Can you hear us? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 스테이 오랜만에 반가웠어요♡ (소리나오나용?) ㅋㅋ
vlive.english: It's working. - Can you hear us?

vlive.korean: 이제 들린다! 소리가 들린다! - 들리나요? The sound is working! - Can you hear us? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 스테이 오랜만에 반가웠어요♡ (소리나오나용?) ㅋㅋ
vlive.english: The sound is working! - Can you hear us?

vlive.korean: 어디서 자꾸 진동소리 들린다 그렇지? Don't you hear a vibrating sound? 듣기 View video Apink : 야식먹방!!!
vlive.english: Don't you hear a vibrating sound?

vlive.korean: [뭐야 진짜 들린다 들려 이 귀염둥이들 큐트력에] "뭐야?" [I can really hear it] "What"? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] 나 기원전 00년생인데 0304형아즈 귀여워서 혼절해따,,(º﹃º):.♡* (SF9 talking about their cute episode)

examples.korean: The cottage sounds idyllic. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 시골집은 목가적으로 들린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The cottage sounds idyllic. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I can’t hear very well. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 귀가 잘 안 들린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I can’t hear very well. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I can hear the sound of running water. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 귀에 수돗물 소리가 들린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I can hear the sound of running water. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The soundtrack is fuzzy in places. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사운드트랙이 군데군데 분명히 안 들린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The soundtrack is fuzzy in places. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His high-flown style just sounds absurd today. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 과장된 어투가 오늘은 그저 우스꽝스럽게 들린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
